trans-unit.source: Represents an x-, y-, and z-coordinate point in 3-D space.
trans-unit.target: 表示 3-D 空間中的 X、Y 和 Z 座標點。

trans-unit.source: In XAML, the delimiter between the values of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> can be either a comma or a space.
trans-unit.target: 在 XAML 中的值之間的分隔符號<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>可以是逗號或空格。

trans-unit.source: Some cultures might use the comma character as the decimal delimiter instead of the period character.
trans-unit.target: 做為十進位的分隔符號，而不是句號字元，某些文化特性可能會使用逗號字元。

trans-unit.source: XAML processing for invariant culture defaults to en-US in most XAML processor implementations, and expects the period to be the decimal delimiter.
trans-unit.target: XAML 處理而異的文化特性為 EN-US，在大部分的 XAML 處理器實作中，預設值，並預期期限設為十進位的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: You should avoid using the comma character as the decimal delimiter if specifying a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> in XAML, because that will clash with the string type conversion of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> attribute value into its components.
trans-unit.target: 您應該避免使用逗號字元做為小數分隔符號，如果指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>在 XAML 中，因為會將衝突的字串類型轉換<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>成其元件屬性值。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: The z-coordinate of this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>.
trans-unit.target: 這個 z 座標<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to subtract <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures using the overloaded subtraction (`-`) operator and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> static <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Subtract%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何減去<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>結構使用多載的減法 (`-`) 運算子和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>靜態<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Subtract%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code illustrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> subtraction methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼說明如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>減法方法。

trans-unit.source: First, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures are instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 首先，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>結構會具現化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are subtracted using the overloaded subtraction (`-`) operator and then they are subtracted using the static <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Subtract%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>減去結構使用多載的減法 (`-`) 運算子，再接著它們會使用靜態減去<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Subtract%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Next, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure is subtracted from the first <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure using the static <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Subtract%2A> method, and finally the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure is subtract from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> using the overloaded subtraction (`-`) operator.
trans-unit.target: 下一步<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>結構會減去第一個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構使用靜態<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Subtract%2A>方法，最後再<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構減去<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>使用多載的減法 (`-`) 運算子。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" /> value of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" /> 結構的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" /> value of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" /> 結構的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> value of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> 結構的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: 要相加的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: 要相加的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />，並傳回結果做為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="point" /> and <paramref name="vector" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="point" /> 和 <paramref name="vector" /> 的總和。

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure is prohibited.
trans-unit.target: 加入<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構以<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>禁止結構。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何加入 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structures for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure and if so, whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> properties of the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> are equal to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> properties of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的物件是否為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構，如果是則判斷指定之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 屬性是否等於這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" /> 結構的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the instances are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行個體相等，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure and if it is also identical to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="o" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構且與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構相同則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If `o` is not a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`o`不<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構，這個方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Double>值可能會遺失有效位數，它們，比較兩個上執行算術運算時<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>邏輯上相等的執行個體可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to check whether an object and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure are equal.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何檢查的物件是否和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> to compare to this instance.
trans-unit.target: 要與這個執行個體 (Instance) 比較的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structures for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if instances are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行個體相等，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Double>值可能會遺失有效位數，它們，比較兩個上執行算術運算時<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>邏輯上相等的執行個體可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structures for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> values for <paramref name="point1" /> and <paramref name="point2" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="point1" /> 和 <paramref name="point2" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> 值相等則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are equal if the values of their <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> properties are the same.
trans-unit.target: 兩個 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 結構的 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> 屬性若相同，就表示兩個結構相等。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Double>值可能會遺失有效位數，它們，比較兩個上執行算術運算時<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>邏輯上相等的執行個體可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to check whether two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何檢查兩個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the hash code of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得的雜湊碼<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> structure to use for the transformation.
trans-unit.target: 要用於轉換的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure by the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構轉換指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: A transformed <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure, the result of transforming <paramref name="point" /> by <paramref name="matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 已轉換的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構，它是 <paramref name="point" /> 和 <paramref name="matrix" /> 的轉換結果。

trans-unit.source: The amount to change the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" /> coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" /> 結構之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 座標的變更量。

trans-unit.source: The amount to change the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" /> coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" /> 結構之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 座標的變更量。

trans-unit.source: The amount to change the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> 結構之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 座標的變更量。

trans-unit.source: Translates the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure by the specified amounts.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定的數量轉譯 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: This operation is equivalent to adding a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure with the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業就相當於新增<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>結構以<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>與對應的結構<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: Note that calling the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Offset%2A> method will only have an effect if you can change the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> properties directly.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Offset%2A>方法才會有作用，如果您可以變更<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A>直接內容。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> is a value type, if you reference a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> object by using a property or indexer, you get a copy of the object, not a reference to the object.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>是實值類型，如果您參考<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>物件使用屬性或索引子，您會取得一份物件，而不是物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to change <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> on a property or indexer reference, a compiler error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試變更<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A>對屬性或索引子參考，則編譯器會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Offset%2A> on the property or indexer will not change the underlying object.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Offset%2A>屬性或索引子上不會變更基礎物件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the value of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> that is referenced as a property or indexer, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>, modify its fields, and then assign the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> back to the property or indexer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要變更的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>參照為屬性或索引子，會建立新<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>修改它的欄位，然後指派<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>回屬性或索引子。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to offset a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何位移<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構。

trans-unit.source: The point to add.
trans-unit.target: 要相加的點。

trans-unit.source: The vector to add.
trans-unit.target: 要相加的向量。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />，並傳回結果做為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure that is the sum of <paramref name="point" /> and <paramref name="vector" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構，這個結構是 <paramref name="point" /> 與 <paramref name="vector" /> 之總和。

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure is prohibited.
trans-unit.target: 加入<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構以<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>禁止結構。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何將加入<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>結構以<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structures for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> coordinates of <paramref name="point1" /> and <paramref name="point2" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="point1" /> 和 <paramref name="point2" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> 座標相等則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are equal if the values of their <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A> , and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> properties are the same.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構相等如果的值及其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A> ，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A>是相同的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Double>值可能會遺失有效位數，它們，比較兩個上執行算術運算時<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>邏輯上相等的執行個體可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the overloaded equality operator to check whether two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用多載等號比較運算子來檢查是否有兩個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The point to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的點。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構轉換成 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The result of converting <paramref name="point" />.
trans-unit.target: 轉換 <paramref name="point" /> 的結果。

trans-unit.source: The point to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的點。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構轉換成 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The result of converting <paramref name="point" />.
trans-unit.target: 轉換 <paramref name="point" /> 的結果。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structures for inequality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> coordinates of <paramref name="point1" /> and <paramref name="point2" /> are different; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="point1" /> 和 <paramref name="point2" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> 座標不同則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are not equal if the values of their <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> properties are different.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構不相等，如果的值及其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A>屬性不相同。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Double>值可能會遺失有效位數，它們，比較兩個上執行算術運算時<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>邏輯上相等的執行個體可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the overloaded inequality operator to check whether two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用多載不等比較運算子來檢查是否有兩個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構不相等。

trans-unit.source: The point to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的點。

trans-unit.source: The matrix that is used to transform <c>point</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用來轉換 <c>point</c> 的矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure by the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構轉換指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming <paramref name="point" /> by using <paramref name="matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <paramref name="point" /> 轉換 <paramref name="matrix" /> 的結果。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the overloaded multiplication operator to transform a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用轉換的多載的乘法運算子<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D>結構。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure on which to perform subtraction.
trans-unit.target: 要執行減法的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to subtract from <c>point1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要從 <c>point1</c> 減去的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構減去 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構，並傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構的結果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure that represents the difference between <paramref name="point1" /> and <paramref name="point2" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構，這個結構表示 <paramref name="point1" /> 與 <paramref name="point2" /> 之間的差。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the overloaded subtraction operator to subtract a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用要減去的多載的減法運算子<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構從<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure from which to subtract vector.
trans-unit.target: 要從中減去向量的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to subtract from point.
trans-unit.target: 要從點減去的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構減去 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構，並傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構的結果。

trans-unit.source: The changed <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure, the result of subtracting <paramref name="vector" /> from <paramref name="point" />.
trans-unit.target: 已變更的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構，這個結構是從 <paramref name="vector" /> 減去 <paramref name="point" /> 的結果。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the overloaded subtraction operator to subtract a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用要減去的多載的減法運算子<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>結構從<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>結構。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of the 3-D point.
trans-unit.target: 3-D 點的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 表示。

trans-unit.target: 將 3-D 點的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 表示轉換成對等的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.target: 對等的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構減去 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.target: 要減去其中內容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to subtract from <c>point1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要從 <c>point1</c> 減去的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構減去 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 結構，並傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構的結果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure that represents the difference between <paramref name="point1" /> and <paramref name="point2" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構，這個結構表示 <paramref name="point1" /> 與 <paramref name="point2" /> 之間的差。

trans-unit.source: The string specifying the format to use.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用之格式的字串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" /> to use the default format defined for the type of the <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" />，使用定義給 <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> 實作 (Implementation) 類型的預設格式。

trans-unit.target: <see langword="IFormatProvider" />，用來格式化數值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" /> to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" />，用來從作業系統的目前地區設定 (Locale) 取得數值格式資訊。
